name: Razer Naga 2012 Wired Laser Mouse
Features: [5600dpi Razer Precision 3.5G Laser Sensor, 1000Hz Ultrapolling / 1ms response time, 200 inches per second max tracking speed, Zero-acoustic Ultraslick mouse feet, 17 MMO-optimized buttons (including 12 button thumb grid), Optional MMO-specific software AddOns, Unlimited character profiles with AddOns, Maximum Comfort for Long Gaming Sessions, Approximate Weight: 134 g / 0.30 lbs.]
